attributes.action: Give all fixed term workers who receive paye payment methods a paid b/holiday
attributes.additional_details: Everyone who is staff get paid days off through the year, but fixed term workers who get paid via paye format have to book the day as a holiday which comes put of their holiday entitlement. I believe all paye staff should be treated the same and therefor be paid for the same holidays without having to use up your own holiday entitlement
attributes.background: Anyone in receipt of their wages being paid via paye format, to be have their bank holidays paid for and not to be taken out of their individual holiday pots.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  Decisions on whether bank holidays are included in leave are for employers, and not dependent on the type of contract. You can read more here: 

https://www.gov.uk/holiday-entitlement-rights

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
